name: Rooster-Fights
description:
What is it?

The rooster-fights simulator game. DONT TAKE IT AS A SERIOUSLY GAME, THIS GAME MADE JUST FOR FUN!!!!!!!!!!!!

Gameplay

Just spawn the roosters (by clicking the LMB) and see they are fighting LOL

Controls

LMB - create rooster

RMB - (on rooster) remove one

Creators

Created by Daniel Oschepkov
